name: Climb to Work #extragamejam
description:
*Unfinished prototype* made for #extragamejam  
Theme: "present"Made with ChaseofBass !  Work starts in a few minutes. The elevator is broken, and you'll be late if you take the stairs.. so get climbing ! 
Controls
  • Z / R- Left and Right
  • Release Left Mouse Button- Jump in direction of mouse
  • Release Right Mouse Button- Throw or Break windows
Tips
  • Jump on your Objects instead of throwing them
  • Holding Left/Right Mouse slows time
  • Objects disappear after a short period of time. Use them to prevent them from vanishing.
